data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Garzê Tibetan that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Garzê Tibetan, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Garzê Tibetan, Sichuan, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Garzê Tibetan, Sichuan, China.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Garzê Tibetan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Garzê Tibetan, Sichuan, China to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 92,413 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Golog people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, encourage the 7,586 believers in Garzê Tibetan to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Garzê Tibetan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 7,586 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Garzê Tibetan.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Garzê Tibetan
